fields.name: customFormula
fields.description: Custom formula for the audience criteria. For example, (1 AND 2) OR 3.

fields.name: formulaFilterType
fields.description: Formula filter type for the personalization audience. Values are: AllCriteriaMatch—All audience criteria are true (AND operation). AnyCriterionMatches—Any audience criterion is true (OR operation). CustomLogicMatches—Audience criteria match the custom formula (for example, (1 AND 2) OR 3).
